Title: Requires immediate notification of a child's parent or guardian when an allegation of child abuse in an educational setting has been made regarding such child
Summary: Requires immediate notification of a child's parent or guardian when an allegation of child abuse in an educational setting has been made regarding such child.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring immediate notification of a child's parent or guardian when an allegation of child abuse in an educational setting has been made regarding such child
